Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory367.png'}
{3: "Crisp, unguarded footsteps can be heard outside the mansion. The person seems to be unaware of Roland and Lamia's presence."}
{3: "But that's still a sign, telling Roland no matter what he wants to do, he better be quick."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Tsk...! I'll just have to rush a little.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland locks the gate with force. Unfortunately, he cannot block the opening he left on the fence when he broke into the yard.'}
{3: 'There is no doubt that the noises will catch the attention of the "guest," but Roland doesn\'t care.'}
{3: 'Suspicious signs make people overthink. They can slow Cerberus down, redirecting their attention to unnecessary details.'}
{3: 'â€”Which will create an opportunity for Roland.'}
{3: 'Someone seems to have heard the loud noise and moves over from the other side of the house.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Eek! What are you doing...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Shh, our guest has arrived.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Time for the next step.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Um... What shall I do then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I want you to stay outside the house and watch them. Let me know immediately if they are leaving.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'As for me... I will check out what our "guest" is here for.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'What is it? I will let you know once I find out.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'But I need someone to watch the house for me, to make sure nobody does anything outside my vision.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lamia jumps high above the house, then disappears.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Alright. I need to find somewhere to hide too.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland turns back and walks into the darkness behind the storage room.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'You have a lot of unfinished works, Miss Voodoo.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Now that the guest and the target are brought together. How do you want to end this...?', 4: '1'}
